text: Uma ningamlekeleli (uMphrofethi) umlekelele uMvelinqangi ngenkathi bemgxosha labo abangakholwayo waba ngomunye wababili ngenkathi bobabili besemgedeni ngenkathi (oyedwa wabo) ethi komngane wakhe (Abubaker) “ungaphatheki kabi ngempela uMvelinqangi ukanye nathi” ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi wehlisela phansi ukuthula kwakhe kuyena futhi (uMvelinqangi) wameseka ngamasosha (amabutho) eningakaze niwabone futhi wenza ukuthi izwi lalabo abangakholwayo laba phansi, wenza izwi likaMvelinqangi laba ngeliphezulu futhi uMvelinqangi uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
